equation:
\begin{equation} \widetilde G(X)= \int dP \,
\widetilde A(P) \, e^{i PX}  =
 \frac{\pi}{c} e^{-c|X|} \, ,
\

\begin{equation} {\widetilde A}(p_1, p_2) =
 \int_{0}^1 \frac{d\rho}{\rho} \;
\langle | \, V(p_1; \infty, \infty) V(p_2; 1,1) \, (b_0 + \bar b_0)
\; \rho^{L_0 + \bar L_0} \; | \widetilde {\cal{B}}^{p-1} \rangle_{|z| =1} \, \,.
\

\begin{equation}
{\widetilde A}(p_1, p_2) = \int dk \, \sum_i \, \int_{0}^1
\frac{d\rho}{\rho} \, \langle | \,V(p_1; \infty, \infty) V(p_2; 1,1)
\, |k, i \rangle \, \rho^{(\frac{k^2}{2} + 2 l_i)}\, \langle k, i |(b_0 + \bar
b_0) |\widetilde {\cal{B}}^{p-1} \rangle_{|z| =1} \,, \

\begin{equation}
 S(p_1, \cdots, p_m) = \int d^2z_3  \dots d^2z_m \, \langle
\, V_1(p_1; \infty, \infty) V_2(p_2; 1,1) \dots V_m(p_m; z_m, \bar
z_m) \} {\cal W}(0,0)\, \rangle\, \,. \

\begin{equation} S_\tau (E) = \frac{1}{2 \sinh\left(\pi E\right)} \left(
G_{ret} (E) e^{i \tau E}  - G_{adv}(E) e^{-i \tau E}  \right)\,. \
\
